title: Hoshi wo Kazoeru Koto
sinopse:
Kunihiko Emori gets depressed when his girlfriend breaks up with him. Then a random stranger goes out of his way to be friendly, and Emori responds with resentment and resistance.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots: Dochira ni Shiyou ka na, Chuu Chuu Tako Kai na
